title: Chicken picadillo cups

ingredients.content: 200 g tasty cheddar cheese, cut into cubes (3-4 cm)
650 - 750 g boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into pieces (3-4 cm)
½ tsp ground black pepper, plus extra to season
½ tsp salt, plus extra to season
150 g brown onion, cut into halves
2 - 3 fresh chillies, trimmed and deseeded if preferred

preparations.content: Place cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>3 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Without cleaning mixing bowl, place water into mixing bowl. Place Varoma into position and weigh chicken into it. Season with salt and pepper, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Stir chicken with aid of spatula, secure Varoma lid and steam <b>8 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Set Varoma aside, discard water and rinse mixing bowl.
Place chicken into mixing bowl and shred <b>5 sec//speed 5<b>. Transfer into a thermal serving bowl or other large bowl and set aside.
Preheat oven to 180°C. Without cleaning mixing bowl, place onion, garlic, chillies, ground coriander and ground cumin into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add oil, tomato and tomato paste and cook <b>4 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>, then blend <b>30 sec/speed 4<b>-7, increasing speed gradually from speed 4 to speed 7<b>.
Add raisins, olives, salt and pepper and cook <b>6 min/80°C//speed 1<b>. Transfer into thermal serving bowl or other large bowl with chicken and stir to combine.

Spray a 6-hole Texas muffin tin with oil. Place a tortilla into each hole of a 6-hole Texas muffin tin, shaping tortilla into a cup shape. Bake for 5-8 minutes (180°C) until golden. Allow to cool and harden in tin for a few minutes, then turn out to cool completely. Repeat with remaining tortillas, spraying tin with oil as needed.
Fill tortilla cups with chicken mixture. Top with grated cheese, 1-2 teaspoons sour cream, coriander leaves and shredded lettuce to serve.

hintsAndTricks: You can serve these simply as tacos, or for a heartier meal, serve with rice and black beans.
